description:
Next Up Hero is a dungeon crawler featuring hand-drawn 
heroes that hack, slash, bongo-drum, boomerang, and jet 
their way through Ventures. Choose your Hero and start 
rolling dungeons, gearing out, and maxing your stats. 
Invite a friend for co-op -- youâ€™re going to need all the help 
you can get.
name: Next Up Hero
